file.name: openapi.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: connect
  description: >-
    This is a generated connector for [WorkDay Connect Service REST API v1](https://community.workday.com/sites/default/files/file-hosting/restapi/index.html) OpenAPI specification.
    
    The WorkDay connect service enables applications to access REST service for Multichannel Collaboration (MCC) services.
  x-ballerina-init-description: >
    The connector initialization requires setting the API credentials. 
 
    Follow [this guide] https://credentials.workday.com/docs/authentication/ and obtain tokens.
  x-ballerina-display:
    label: Workday Connect
    iconPath: icon.png
  version: v2
tags:
  - name: messageTemplates
    description: Get Message Templates
  - name: notificationTypes
    description: Get Notification Types
  - name: sendMessage
    description: sendMessage
paths:
  /messageTemplates/{id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - messageTemplates
      summary: |-
        Secured by: Set Up: Message Templates

        Scope: Learning Coredescription
      operationId: getMessageTemplateByID
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the resource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: >-
                  #/components/schemas/MessageTemplateDetailRef
        '400':
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
    put:
      tags:
        - messageTemplates
      summary: |-
        Secured by: Set Up: Message Templates

        Scope: Learning Core
      operationId: createMessageTemplateByID
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the resource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: >-
                #/components/schemas/MessageTemplateDetailRef
        required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data. Updating resource.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: >-
                  #/components/schemas/MessageTemplateDetailRef
        '400':
          description: >-
            Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)


            You must enter a Message to continue.


            A Message Template with the same name already exists. Please enter a
            new Message Template name.


            The field template name is required and must have a value.


            Notification Type is required and must have a value.


            You must enter a Subject to continue.


            You must enter a Body to continue.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
      x-codegen-request-body-name: messageTemplateDetail
    patch:
      tags:
        - messageTemplates
      description: |-
        Secured by: Set Up: Message Templates

        Scope: Learning Core
      operationId: updateMessageTemplateByID
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the resource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: >-
                #/components/schemas/MessageTemplateDetailRef
        required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data. Updating resource.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: >-
                  #/components/schemas/MessageTemplateDetailRef
        '400':
          description: >-
            Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)


            A Message Template with the same name already exists. Please enter a
            new Message Template name.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
      x-codegen-request-body-name: messageTemplateDetail
  /notificationTypes:
    get:
      tags:
        - notificationTypes
      description: |-
        Secured by: Administer Communications, Set Up: Message Templates

        Scope: Learning Core
      operationId: getNotificationTypes
      parameters:
        - name: limit
          in: query
          description: >-
            The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default is
            20. The maximum is 100.
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
        - name: offset
          in: query
          description: >-
            The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection.
            The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control
            paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset
            is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with
            the 10th object.
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  data:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      $ref: >-
                        #/components/schemas/NotificationCategoryDetail
                  total:
                    type: integer
                    format: int64
                description: collection something or other
        '400':
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
  /sendMessage:
    post:
      tags:
        - sendMessage
      description: 'Secured by: Administer Communications'
      operationId: sendMessage
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: >-
                #/components/schemas/MessageDetail
        required: true
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Resource created.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: >-
                  #/components/schemas/MessageDetail
        '400':
          description: >-
            Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)


            Notification Type must match the Message Template's Notification
            Type.


            Message Template cannot be provided if Email or Push details is
            provided.


            Notification Type is required and must have a value.


            Submit only valid types.


            Submit Workday IDs that are of the same contact reference type.


            At least one Recipient is required.


            Submit Worker type Workday IDs.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
      x-codegen-request-body-name: messageDetail
  /notificationTypes/{id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - notificationTypes
      description: |-
        Secured by: Administer Communications, Set Up: Message Templates

        Scope: Learning Core
      operationId: getNotificationTypeByID
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the resource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: >-
                  #/components/schemas/NotificationCategoryDetail
        '400':
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
  /messageTemplates:
    get:
      tags:
        - messageTemplates
      description: |-
        Secured by: Set Up: Message Templates

        Scope: Learning Core
      operationId: getMessageTemplate
      parameters:
        - name: inactive
          in: query
          description: Indicates template is active or has been disabled.
          schema:
            type: boolean
        - name: limit
          in: query
          description: >-
            The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default is
            20. The maximum is 100.
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
        - name: name
          in: query
          description: Message Template Name
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: notificationType
          in: query
          description: Notification Type indicates where the template can be used.
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: offset
          in: query
          description: >-
            The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection.
            The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control
            paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset
            is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with
            the 10th object.
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  data:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      $ref: >-
                        #/components/schemas/MessageTemplateDetailRef
                  total:
                    type: integer
                    format: int64
                description: collection something or other
        '400':
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
    post:
      tags:
        - messageTemplates
      description: |-
        Secured by: Set Up: Message Templates

        Scope: Learning Core
      operationId: createMessageTemplate
      parameters:
        - name: inactive
          in: query
          description: Indicates template is active or has been disabled.
          schema:
            type: boolean
        - name: name
          in: query
          description: Message Template Name
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: notificationType
          in: query
          description: Notification Type indicates where the template can be used.
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: >-
                #/components/schemas/MessageTemplateDetailRef
        required: true
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Resource created.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: >-
                  #/components/schemas/MessageTemplateDetailRef
        '400':
          description: >-
            Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)


            A Message Template with the same name already exists. Please enter a
            new Message Template name.


            You must enter a Message to continue.


            The field template name is required and must have a value.


            Notification Type is required and must have a value.


            You must enter a Body to continue.


            You must enter a Subject to continue.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
      x-codegen-request-body-name: messageTemplateDetail
components:
  schemas:
    INSTANCE_MODEL_REFERENCE:
      required:
        - id
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          pattern: ^(?:(?:[0-9a-f]{32})|(?:[0-9]+\$[0-9]+)|(\S+=\S+))$
          type: string
          description: wid / id / reference id
        descriptor:
          type: string
          description: A description of the instance
          readOnly: true
        href:
          type: string
          description: A link to the instance
          readOnly: true
    ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE:
      required:
        - error
      type: object
      properties:
        error:
          type: string
          description: A description of the error
    VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        - type: object
          properties:
            errors:
              type: array
              description: An array of validation errors
              items:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
    MULTIPLE_INSTANCE_MODEL_REFERENCE:
      type: object
      properties:
        total:
          type: integer
        data:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/INSTANCE_MODEL_REFERENCE'
    ParentCategory:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/INSTANCE_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        - type: object
    NotificationCategoryDetail:
      allOf:
        - type: object
          properties:
            parentCategory:
              $ref: >-
                #/components/schemas/ParentCategory
            name:
              type: string
              example: >-
                Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, cum choro singulis consectetuer ut,
                ubique iisque contentiones ex duo. Quo lorem etiam eu.
              x-workday-type: Text
            referenceID:
              type: string
              description: >-
                The Reference ID to use for lookups within our Workday Web
                Services. For ~supervisory organizations~, this is also the
                'Organization ID'
              example: >-
                Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, cum choro singulis consectetuer ut,
                ubique iisque contentiones ex duo. Quo lorem etiam eu.
              x-workday-type: Text
            descriptor:
              type: string
              description: A preview of the instance
              example: Lorem ipsum dolor sit ame
            id:
              type: string
              description: Id of the instance
    SenderOverride:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/INSTANCE_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        - type: object
    CommID:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/INSTANCE_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        - type: object
    EmailDetail:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/EmailDetailRef'
        - type: object
    Recipients:
      allOf:
        - $ref: >-
            #/components/schemas/RecipientsDetail
        - type: object
    MessageTemplate:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/INSTANCE_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        - type: object
    PushDetail:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/PushDetailRef'
        - type: object
    MessageDetail:
      allOf:
        - type: object
          properties:
            senderOverride:
              $ref: >-
                #/components/schemas/SenderOverride
            commID:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/CommID'
            emailDetail:
              $ref: >-
                #/components/schemas/EmailDetail
            recipients:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Recipients'
            messageTemplate:
              $ref: >-
                #/components/schemas/MessageTemplate
            notificationType:
              $ref: >-
                #/components/schemas/NotificationType
            pushDetail:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/PushDetail'
    CreatedBy:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/INSTANCE_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        - type: object
    NotificationType:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/INSTANCE_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        - type: object
    LastUpdatedBy:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/INSTANCE_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        - type: object
    MessageTemplateDetailRef:
      allOf:
        - required:
            - name
            - notificationType
          type: object
          properties:
            createdBy:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreatedBy'
            emailDetail:
              $ref: >-
                #/components/schemas/EmailDetail
            lastUpdated:
              type: string
              format: date
              x-workday-type: Date
            pushDetail:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/PushDetail'
            usageCount:
              type: integer
              description: Count of instances using this Message Template
              example: 158271606
              x-workday-type: Numeric
            createdOn:
              type: string
              description: Gives the date that the instance was originally created.
              format: date
              x-workday-type: Date
            notificationType:
              $ref: >-
                #/components/schemas/NotificationType
            name:
              type: string
              description: Message Template Name
              example: >-
                Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, cum choro singulis consectetuer ut,
                ubique iisque contentiones ex duo. Quo lorem etiam eu.
              x-workday-type: Text
            lastUpdatedBy:
              $ref: >-
                #/components/schemas/LastUpdatedBy
            referenceID:
              type: string
              description: >-
                The Reference ID to use for lookups within our Workday Web
                Services. For ~supervisory organizations~, this is also the
                'Organization ID'
              example: >-
                Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, cum choro singulis consectetuer ut,
                ubique iisque contentiones ex duo. Quo lorem etiam eu.
              x-workday-type: Text
            inactive:
              type: boolean
              description: Indicates template is active or has been disabled.
              example: true
              x-workday-type: Boolean
            id:
              type: string
              description: Id of the instance
            descriptor:
              type: string
              description: A preview of the instance
              example: Lorem ipsum dolor sit ame
    PushDetailRef:
      allOf:
        - required:
            - message
          type: object
          properties:
            redirectURL:
              type: string
              description: >-
                The URL to launch the appropriate mobile app upon
                acknowledgement.
              example: >-
                Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, cum choro singulis consectetuer ut,
                ubique iisque contentiones ex duo. Quo lorem etiam eu.
              x-workday-type: Text
            message:
              type: string
              description: Message content of a push notification.
              example: >-
                Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, cum choro singulis consectetuer ut,
                ubique iisque contentiones ex duo. Quo lorem etiam eu.
              x-workday-type: Rich Text
            id:
              type: string
              description: Id of the instance
    EmailDetailRef:
      allOf:
        - required:
            - body
            - subject
          type: object
          properties:
            name:
              type: string
              description: Email Configuration Data container for REST API.
              example: >-
                Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, cum choro singulis consectetuer ut,
                ubique iisque contentiones ex duo. Quo lorem etiam eu.
              x-workday-type: Text
            body:
              type: string
              description: Message content of the email.
              example: >-
                Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, cum choro singulis consectetuer ut,
                ubique iisque contentiones ex duo. Quo lorem etiam eu.
              x-workday-type: Rich Text
            subject:
              type: string
              description: Email subject line.
              example: >-
                Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, cum choro singulis consectetuer ut,
                ubique iisque contentiones ex duo. Quo lorem etiam eu.
              x-workday-type: Rich Text
            replyTo:
              type: string
              description: Reply To
              example: >-
                Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, cum choro singulis consectetuer ut,
                ubique iisque contentiones ex duo. Quo lorem etiam eu.
